  • Agricultural Colleges in Nepal

    Lakshman Basnet   May 9, 2017    info    1 min read


    I have tried to list below essential information of different agricultural/agro related colleges and universities in Nepal. This list mightn’t be complete one and is updating. You can comment for any feedbacks.

    1 Himalayan College of Agricultural Services and Technology HICAST

    Kalanki 44600, Kathmandu, Nepal
    +977-1-5195050
    info@hicast.edu.np
    hicast.edu.np
    /HICAST.official
    25535


    2 Institute of Agriculture and Animal Science IAAS

    Sanepa, Lalitpur, Nepal
    01-5552378, 5550087
    info@iaas.edu.np
    iaas.edu.np
    /Institute-of-Agriculture-Animal-Science


    3 Nepal Polytechnical College

    Bharatpur - 11, Chitwan
    +977-56-524161, 056-524986, 572417
    info@npibharatpur.org.np
    npibharatpur.org.np


    4 Agriculture and Forestry University

    Rampur, Chitwan, Nepal
    977-56-591655, 977-56-591777
    admin@afu.edu.np
    afu.edu.np

    Agricultural colleges in Nepal

    This post is being updated. Please visit back soon for complete list. Thank you. :)
